member.name: DOCINFO
member.summary: The DOCINFO structure contains the input and output file names and other information used by the function.

member.name: DOCINFO.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the structure.

member.name: DOCINFO.lpszDocName
member.summary: Pointer to a null-terminated string that specifies the name of the document.

member.name: DOCINFO.lpszOutput
member.summary: Pointer to a null-terminated string that specifies the name of an output file. If this pointer is NULL, the output will be sent to the device identified by the device context handle that was passed to the function.

member.name: DOCINFO.lpszDatatype
member.summary: Pointer to a null-terminated string that specifies the type of data used to record the print job. The legal values for this member can be found by calling EnumPrintProcessorDatatypes and can include such values as raw, emf, or XPS_PASS. This member can be NULL. Note that the requested data type might be ignored.

summary.para: Specifies additional information about the print job. This member must be zero or one of the following values.

listheader.description: Applications that use banding should set this flag for optimal performance during printing.
The application will use raster operations that involve reading from the destination surface.
